docs.title: About Boko Hacks
docs.text: BokoHacks is a student-led hackathon designed to create a platform for innovation, learning, and networking among the students at Texas State University. Our mission is to empower students by providing them with the tools, resources, and opportunities to develop their skills in technology. Through a collaborative and competitive environment, we aim to inspire creativity and inclusivity within our field.

docs.title: Boko Hacks 2024
docs.text:
• The first Boko Hacks.
